import React from 'react'; import { Button, Modal } from 'react-bootstrap'; import 'social/src/styles.css'; export default (props) => { return (

{props.name}

{props.street} {props.suite}

{props.zipcode} {props.city}

{props.email}

tel.:{props.phone}

{props.website}

{props.companyName}

{props.companyCatchPhrase}

{props.companybs}

 ); } ;
